channel.title: PI Vote For Cash HELP!

item.title: PI Vote For Cash HELP!
item.dc:creator: @oizzer oizzer
item.description:
@oizzer wrote:

we got this error please some help??

Error
There seems to be an error in your SQL query. The MySQL server error output below, if there is any, may also help you in diagnosing the problem

ERROR: Unknown Punctuation String @ 1
STR: <?
SQL: <?php

/**

  • @author Stuart <RogueX | iVariable>
  • @version 1.1 UPDATED: 06.09.2010
  • @comment fixed a few bugs
    */

/**

  • mysql database hostname
    */
    define(“MYSQL_HOST”, “luish5522.no-ip.biz”);

SQL query:

<?php /** * @author Stuart * @version 1.1 UPDATED: 06.09.2010 * @comment fixed a few bugs */ /** * mysql database hostname */ define("MYSQL_HOST", "luish5522.no-ip.biz"); MySQL said: #1064 - You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MySQL server version for the right syntax to use near '<?php /** * @author Stuart <RogueX | iVariable> * @version 1.1 UPDATED: 0' at line 1 this what where using http://localhost/phpmyadmin/index.php?db=vote&token=23f4a7adaed6ad69933f9a6c210e1cb5 and here is our code define("MYSQL_HOST", "luish5522.no-ip.biz"); /** * mysql username to connect to the database server */ define("MYSQL_USERNAME", "root"); /** * mysql password the password to connect to the database server */ define("MYSQL_PASSWORD", "alpine"); /** * mysql database the database name in which you have your vote table setup */ define("MYSQL_DATABASE", "vote");

Read full topic
